name: Cloud Forth
description:
Animal/Yokai/Chimera Character Main

Floating manipulative platformer.

The main character, Myodogii the Specter, is a

an animal that lives in the world of clouds.

meat is his favorite food!

The only thing that is unclear is why Myodogii is a youkai.

Myodogii is a yokai, but I don't know why. And in order to recall the memories of his previous life

Myodogui is on an endless journey.
